remarks: Ring multiplication distributes over subtraction.  ( ~ subdi analog.) (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2014.)
statement:
ringsubdi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
ringsubdi.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
ringsubdi.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` R ) $.
ringsubdi.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
ringsubdi.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
ringsubdi.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
ringsubdi.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
ringsubdi $p |- ( ph -> ( X .x. ( Y .- Z ) ) = ( ( X .x. Y ) .- ( X .x. Z ) ) ) $.
